member.name: T:FYFY_plugins.TriggerManager.Triggered2D
member.summary: Component specifying that the GameObject is in contact with at least one other GameObject.

remarks.para: ! DO NOT TOUCH MANUALLY OTHERWISE WE CAN'T GUARANTEE THE COMPORTMENT !

member.name: P:FYFY_plugins.TriggerManager.Triggered2D.Targets
member.summary: Gets all the GameObjects in contact with this GameObject.

member.name: T:FYFY_plugins.TriggerManager.Triggered3D
member.summary: Component specifying that the GameObject is in contact with at least one other GameObject.

remarks.para: ! DO NOT TOUCH MANUALLY OTHERWISE WE CAN'T GUARANTEE THE COMPORTMENT !

member.name: P:FYFY_plugins.TriggerManager.Triggered3D.Targets
member.summary: Gets all the GameObjects in contact with this GameObject.

member.name: T:FYFY_plugins.TriggerManager.TriggerSensitive2D
member.summary: TriggerSensitive2D allows GameObject to be noticed when it is in contact with another GameObject. In this case the Triggered2d component (dynamically added) provides the list of GameObject in contact with him.

member.name: T:FYFY_plugins.TriggerManager.TriggerSensitive3D
member.summary: TriggerSensitive3D allows GameObject to be noticed when it is in contact with another GameObject. In this case the Triggered3d component (dynamically added) provides the list of GameObject in contact with him.
